entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
